Use coupon code 50OFF and get the first month half off!


[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]IO Zoom is a BBB accredited and registered company based in Houston, Texas. Our datacenter is located in Los Angeles, CA at 700 Wilshire Blvd with connectivity to Comcast, nLayer, TiNet, Zayo, HE, PCCW, China Unicom, and China Telecom.[/SIZE]


[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]Not all VPS hosting providers are the same. Here is why we're better.[/SIZE]


[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]Lightning Fast Servers[/SIZE]


[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]Our servers were built for performance and run the latest Intel Xeon CPU's with a minimum of 128 GB of RAM, 100% pure SSD drives in hardware RAID 10. Powerful servers mean faster website response times and according to research have an impact on your search engine rankings.[/SIZE]
 


[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]DDoS Protection[/SIZE]


[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]We include up to 20 Gbps DDoS protection that prevents over 95% of the most common DDoS attacks keeping your VPS online.[/SIZE]
 


[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]Better Performance[/SIZE]


[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]KVM virtualization not only gives you more freedom but is fully isolated with independent resources which increases server stability and performance.[/SIZE]


[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]100% Uptime Guarantee[/SIZE]
[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]We stand by our hardware and network that if it isn't reachable for even a minute we'll issue credit to your account according to our service level agreement.[/SIZE]


[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]Affordably Priced[/SIZE]
[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]Starting at just $10/mo for 1 GB of guaranteed RAM, 20 GB SSD storage, and 2000 GB bandwidth. See all of our affordable plans below.[/SIZE]

[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]FAQ[/SIZE]


[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]Q: Are these VPS plans self managed or managed?[/SIZE]


[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]A: Our plans are self managed but if you add cPanel we will manage it for you at no charge.[/SIZE]


[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]Q: How long will it take to setup my VPS?[/SIZE]
[SIZE=14.666666666666666px]A: Please allow up to 24 hours to setup your VPS. If you order during sales hours it will be setup within a few hours. All orders are manually verified and checked for fraud before setup.[/SIZE]
